definition: any activity that is performed in an especially solemn elaborate or formal way
details:
noun
- any activity that is performed in an especially solemn elaborate or formal way
= example: any activity that is performed in an especially solemn elaborate or formal way
- the proper or conventional behavior on some solemn occasion
= example: the proper or conventional behavior on some solemn occasion
- a formal event performed on a special occasion
= example: a formal event performed on a special occasion
= synonyms: observance
